person.persName: Abraham B. Lewis (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Buford Lewis and Mary Lewis. Married to Mary A. Jones Lewis in Lyon County, Kentucky, on October 12, 1859. Father of William B. Lewis and Thomas H. Lewis. Resident of Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.
